mean_cn: adj. 排外的；  n. 独家新闻
mean_en: (of a group, society, etc.) not very willing to allow new people to become members, especially if they are from a lower social class
sentence: Sorry, this club is very exclusive: VIPs only.
sentence_trans: 对不起，这家俱乐部只接受VIP会员。
word_etyma: exclu(de)排除 + sive形容词后缀 → exclusive专有的，排外的
